fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
- 10$
- With 1 House: 45$
- With 2 Houses: 100$
- With 3 Houses: 160$
- With 4 Houses: 200$
- With Hotel: 280$

Houses cost $125 each
Hotel costs $300 plus 4 Houses

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you buy this, you get a Gun, allowing you to mug a person once by landing on the same square as them for 500$ before losing the item.
- When you have a full set, you get an upgraded gun which allows you to the exact same thing, but infinitely.
